git.commitMessage:
fix: Multiple UI and bot AI improvements

- Fix locked skin display in Settings Panel Theme tab
  - Visual themes now show lock icon and required level
  - Prevent selecting locked skins

- Fix invisible XP progress bar in LevelProgressBar
  - Convert dynamic Tailwind gradient classes to inline CSS
  - All level tier colors now render correctly

- Fix roundsWon/Lost calculation in game over panel
  - Now based on actual round score instead of betting team only
  - Defensive team wins now counted correctly

- Improve bot AI for brown 0 handling
  - Bots now actively AVOID winning tricks containing brown 0
  - Added priority check before red 0 capture logic
  - Both medium and hard difficulty affected

- Improve bet suggestions for red 0 / brown 0 cards
  - Red 0 evaluation now considers card control (7, 6 in red)
  - Having only red 0 is actually good (teammate has control)
  - Brown 0 is neutral (can poison opponents strategically)
